categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tyus Huols was a male Arcona who served the Jedi Order as a Jedi Master during the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. During the war, he worked as an equipment merchant on the planet Corellia where he ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport. Huols had no hair, yellow eyes and brown skin. While at his stall, he wore white and brown robes and carried a lightsaber.

Tyus Huols first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game, he serves as a Republic speciality goods vendor on Corellia. His location was also marked on a map in the accompanying Prima Games strategy guide, which gave his first name.
